"Small City with a Big Heart"
=============================

The City of La Villa welcomes you. Feel free to browse our site and [contact us](https://cityoflavilla.org/contact) if you have any comments or questions. Thank you.

City News
---------

[![City of La Villa, TX](https://graph.facebook.com/v4.0/139821219431459/picture)](https://www.facebook.com/139821219431459)
[City of La Villa, TX](https://www.facebook.com/139821219431459)

 [January 29, 2026](https://www.facebook.com/483423740494477/posts/1325768989593277)

Good Evening Residents, We are excited to announce that street improvements to Cardinal Lane have been completed and we will be starting on Cottonwood Ave tomorrow. We ask parents to please use caution when picking up their children from school. We anticipate the repairs will take 2-3 weeks -weather permitting. Thank you, Board and Administration

[![](https://scontent-lax7-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-6/619582529_1325768966259946_2068705803251216584_n.jpg?stp=dst-jpg_s720x720_tt6&_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=833d8c&_nc_ohc=5tYUX05KO78Q7kNvwEttLaL&_nc_oc=AdkSNHA_oQ-JGUhXy4lhy7O3593tIWUjnGnSPsieWFqnGVRIJdKe1Wdiz0iTaAcUwlc&_nc_zt=23&_nc_ht=scontent-lax7-1.xx&edm=AKIiGfEEAAAA&_nc_gid=xf8fHGBtnO2NAM52c5iaFg&_nc_tpa=Q5bMBQEPdTLI31Lq1xwbENNEYOiRwELt3KryK8uglk5tsZVirXLb2XEU-552QKm5rUHuIHnO7dtIJlZnlw&oh=00_AfotZdDqzmcwHGX1ilKdrntZ7mG27sp6v4dYW5xXyn_yxw&oe=6982DF74)](https://www.facebook.com/483423740494477/posts/1325768989593277)

 [January 28, 2026](https://www.facebook.com/483423740494477/posts/1324877966349046)

\*Addendum: This closure also includes the baseball fields\* Good Evening Residents, We are happy to announce that construction has started on improvements to our city park! Unfortunately, this means the park will be closed until the renovations are complete. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause but rest assured crews will work hard to complete the updates soon. Thank you, Administration

[![City of La Villa, TX](https://graph.facebook.com/v4.0/139821219431459/picture)](https://www.facebook.com/139821219431459)
[City of La Villa, TX](https://www.facebook.com/139821219431459)

 [January 26, 2026](https://www.facebook.com/483423740494477/posts/1323005966536246)

Good Evening Residents, Please disregard prior post about City Hall opening at 10am tomorrow, Monday, January 26, 2026. We will be open at 8am. Our apologies for the confusion. Thank you, Administration

[![City of La Villa, TX](https://graph.facebook.com/v4.0/139821219431459/picture)](https://www.facebook.com/139821219431459)
[City of La Villa, TX](https://www.facebook.com/139821219431459)

 [January 25, 2026](https://www.facebook.com/483423740494477/posts/1322079916628851)

\*Update: Edcouch-Elsa ISD will also have a warming shelter, see their flyer for more information!\* Greetings Residents As we get ready for the coming winter storm, be aware shelters have been set up with the closest one being in Edcouch-Elsa. We urge residents to take caution when using heating devices for their homes. Remember a stove/oven is not designed for space heating and poses a real danger. Also be cautious while driving as ice may form on roadways and lead to accidents, and please ensure all pets are brought indoors or provided an adequate shelter. The next couple of days...

 [January 16, 2026](https://www.facebook.com/483423740494477/posts/1314550397381803)

In Observance of Martin Luther King, Jr. Day, City Hall will be closed on Monday, January 19th, 2026.
